name: RSQUARED
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2020 by JoJo Lu
Theme: Repair

CONTROLS & RULES
Change Direction — Tap WASD or ARROWS
— Collect cogs in the colours shown on the indicator (order doesn't matter)
— Don't collect the colours not shown on the indicator or you'll lose a life

HIGH SCORE BOARD
1. mehmeh — 41 Robots Repaired
2. Will — 26 Robots Repaired
3. y. — 21 Robots Repaired
4. Iris— 17 Robots Repaired
5. Matt — 11 Robots Repaired

Tweet me @banditjoj with a screenshot of your high score and I'll add you to the board!

THANKS TO
Iris and Naomi for moral support
Alex for nutritional support
VIGAMUS for hosting the jam site
Dneproman, altfuture, bmccoy2, flood-mix, ganstmon, InspectorJ for SFX

I've been quite busy this year and between that and being in another country where non parlo bene l'Italiano I was considering skipping this year but I'm glad I decided to keep up with the tradition.
